00035 typedef struct UA_ServerConfig {
00036     UA_Boolean  Login_enableAnonymous;
00037 
00038     UA_Boolean  Login_enableUsernamePassword;
00039     char**      Login_usernames;
00040     char**      Login_passwords;
00041     UA_UInt32   Login_loginsCount;
00042 
00043     char*       Application_applicationURI;
00044     char*       Application_applicationName;
00045 } UA_ServerConfig;

00142 
00144     void (*deleteMembers)(struct UA_ServerNetworkLayer *nl);
00145 } UA_ServerNetworkLayer;

00166 typedef struct {
00167     void *handle; 
00168 
00183     UA_StatusCode (*read)(void *handle, const UA_NodeId nodeid, UA_Boolean includeSourceTimeStamp,
00184                           const UA_NumericRange *range, UA_DataValue *value);
00185 
00197     UA_StatusCode (*write)(void *handle, const UA_NodeId nodeid, const UA_Variant *data, const UA_NumericRange *range);
00198 } UA_DataSource;
00199 
00200 /* Value Callbacks can be attach to value and value type nodes. If not-null, they are called before
00201    reading and after writing respectively */
00202 typedef struct {
00203     void *handle;
00204     void (*onRead)(void *handle, const UA_NodeId nodeid, const UA_Variant *data, const UA_NumericRange *range);
00205     void (*onWrite)(void *handle, const UA_NodeId nodeid, const UA_Variant *data, const UA_NumericRange *range);
00206 } UA_ValueCallback;

00224 static UA_INLINE UA_StatusCode
00225 UA_Server_addVariableNode(UA_Server *server, const UA_NodeId requestedNewNodeId,
00226                           const UA_NodeId parentNodeId, const UA_NodeId referenceTypeId,
00227                           const UA_QualifiedName browseName, const UA_NodeId typeDefinition,
00228                           const UA_VariableAttributes attr, UA_NodeId *outNewNodeId) {
00229     return UA_Server_addNode(server, UA_NODECLASS_VARIABLE, requestedNewNodeId, parentNodeId,
00230                              referenceTypeId, browseName, typeDefinition, (const UA_NodeAttributes*)&attr,
00231                              &UA_TYPES[UA_TYPES_VARIABLEATTRIBUTES], outNewNodeId); }
00232 
00233 static UA_INLINE UA_StatusCode
00234 UA_Server_addVariableTypeNode(UA_Server *server, const UA_NodeId requestedNewNodeId,
00235                               const UA_NodeId parentNodeId, const UA_NodeId referenceTypeId,
00236                               const UA_QualifiedName browseName, const UA_VariableTypeAttributes attr,
00237                               UA_NodeId *outNewNodeId) {
00238     return UA_Server_addNode(server, UA_NODECLASS_VARIABLETYPE, requestedNewNodeId, parentNodeId,
00239                              referenceTypeId, browseName, UA_NODEID_NULL, (const UA_NodeAttributes*)&attr,
00240                              &UA_TYPES[UA_TYPES_VARIABLETYPEATTRIBUTES], outNewNodeId); }
00241

00245                         const UA_QualifiedName browseName, const UA_NodeId typeDefinition,
00246                         const UA_ObjectAttributes attr, UA_NodeId *outNewNodeId) {
00247     return UA_Server_addNode(server, UA_NODECLASS_OBJECT, requestedNewNodeId, parentNodeId,
00248                              referenceTypeId, browseName, typeDefinition, (const UA_NodeAttributes*)&attr,
00249                              &UA_TYPES[UA_TYPES_OBJECTATTRIBUTES], outNewNodeId); }

00327 /***********************/
00328 /* Set Node Attributes */
00329 /***********************/
00330 
00331 /* The following node attributes cannot be changed once the node is created
00332    - NodeClass
00333    - NodeId
00334    - Symmetric
00335    
00336    The following attributes will eventually be managed by a userrights layer and are unsupported yet
00337    - WriteMask
00338    - UserWriteMask
00339    - AccessLevel
00340    - UserAccessLevel
00341    - UserExecutable
00342 
00343    The following attributes are currently taken from the value variant:
00344    - DataType
00345    - ValueRank
00346    - ArrayDimensions
00347    
00348    - Historizing is currently unsupported
00349   */
00350 
00351 UA_StatusCode UA_EXPORT
00352 UA_Server_setNodeAttribute_value(UA_Server *server, const UA_NodeId nodeId,
00353                                  const UA_DataType *type, const UA_Variant value);
00354 
00355 /* The value is moved into the node (not copied). The value variant is _inited internally. */
00356 UA_StatusCode UA_EXPORT
00357 UA_Server_setNodeAttribute_value_destructive(UA_Server *server, const UA_NodeId nodeId,
00358                                              const UA_DataType *type, UA_Variant *value);
00359 
00360 /* Succeeds only if the node contains a variant value */
00361 UA_StatusCode UA_EXPORT
00362 UA_Server_setAttribute_value_callback(UA_Server *server, const UA_NodeId nodeId,
00363                                       const UA_ValueCallback callback);

00443 /***********************/
00444 /* Get Node Attributes */
00445 /***********************/
00446 
00447 /* The following attributes cannot be read. They make no sense to read internally since the "admin"
00448    user always has all rights.
00449    - UserWriteMask
00450    - UserAccessLevel
00451    - UserExecutable
00452 */
00453 
00454 /* Don't use this function. There are typed versions for every supported attribute. */
00455 UA_StatusCode UA_EXPORT
00456 UA_Server_getNodeAttribute(UA_Server *server, UA_NodeId nodeId, UA_AttributeId attributeId, void *v);
00457   
00458 static UA_INLINE UA_StatusCode
00459 UA_Server_getNodeAttribute_nodeId(UA_Server *server, UA_NodeId nodeId, UA_NodeId *outNodeId) {
00460     return UA_Server_getNodeAttribute(server, nodeId, UA_ATTRIBUTEID_NODEID, outNodeId); }
